# BlazorMock Documentation

Welcome to the documentation hub. This repo includes a guided learning path to build a trucking schedule app with Blazor, plus additional references and status docs.

- Start with the step-by-step learning path below.
- Each step links to a live example in the app (under /examples/stepN) and to the next step.
- Use the Progress page in the app to track your completion.

## Step-by-step progression

0. [Step 00 ‚Äî Prerequisites & VS Code Setup](./Steps/Step00.md)
1. [Step 01 ‚Äî New Clean Project](./Steps/Step01.md)
2. [Step 02 ‚Äî Razor Syntax & Display](./Steps/Step02.md)
3. [Step 03 ‚Äî Reusable Components](./Steps/Step03.md)
4. [Step 04 ‚Äî Event Binding](./Steps/Step04.md)
5. [Step 05 ‚Äî Forms & Validation](./Steps/Step05.md)
6. [Step 06 ‚Äî Routing & Navigation](./Steps/Step06.md)
7. [Step 07 ‚Äî EF Core Models](./Steps/Step07.md)
8. [Step 08 ‚Äî Setup EF Core & DbContext](./Steps/Step08.md)
9. [Step 09 ‚Äî CRUD Operations & Related Data](./Steps/Step09.md)
10. [Step 10 ‚Äî State Management](./Steps/Step10.md)
11. [Step 11 ‚Äî Assignment Logic & Business Rules](./Steps/Step11.md)
12. [Step 12 ‚Äî Pay & Expense Calculation](./Steps/Step12.md)
13. [Step 13 ‚Äî Dashboard & Reports](./Steps/Step13.md)
